reviewText: stick to index funds or at least funds.
stick to index funds or at least funds

I did what Jim Cramer would have wanted me to do, as soon as I reread the book and understood the material I passed it on to the next person.  His investment knowledge makes for a clear and concise understanding of what could be difficult information.

I did what Jim Cramer would have wanted me to do, as soon as I reread the book and understood the material I passed it on to the next person.  His investment knowledge makes for a clear and concise understanding of what could be difficult information.
Gave you some insight but in a general form.  I would use it as a beginning place to proceed if thinking about getting into the stock market.

professor cramer is a little unorthodox.  he speaks the truth, tells you what to watch out for and why. unlike a most experts he admits when he makes a mistake.  gives you rules of thumb and tells you how the markets
work.
